channel.title: Welcome to the community on Community Health Toolkit
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to the community on Community Health Toolkit

item.title: CHT Technology Radars
item.description: It is essential for a development toolkit such as the Community Health Toolkit to constantly improve and keep track with the latest useful innovations. It is important to openly look for innovations and new technologies and to question established technologies and methods every now and then. To enhance visibility and clarity on the technology choices, the technological strategy, and the available CHT features and tools, we leverage a framework called Technology Radar.

item.title: Contributor Hall of Fame
item.description: CodeThank you to everyone who has contributed to the CHT codebase over the years! To see the full list, visit each repo on GitHub. cht-android cht-conf cht-core cht-docs cht-interoperability cht-pipeline cht-sync cht-watchdog SecurityKudos to everyone who has disclosed security vulnerabilities. Alex Anderson with 4 disclosures #9122, #9121, #9120, #9108
